welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Jose Guayabal, El Salvador! Known for its vibrant culture and picturesque landscape, we invite you to immerse yourselves in the charm of our city and explore all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ilopango International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ilopango International Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Salvador International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
